title: [安全]Door Protection V1.5 —— 不要怕拆门了[1.4.7-R1.0]
author: MC.菜鸟
txt_content:
本帖最后由 MC.菜鸟 于 2013-3-10 10:49 编辑 
What is Door protection?

Door protection is a simple plugin which is defined by groups (Permission groups), If the group has the permission node they can open up doors, If they don't it deny's their access, For example: If your new to the server and you first start with a group called [Default] & you don't want them to open up any doors etc, You simply leave out the permission node & vice versa to open them

Permission nodes

doorlock.open
Important! YOU MUST GIVE THE PERMISSION NODE TO ANY GROUP YOU WANT TO ALLOW OPENING UP DOORS!
原文
下面为中文翻译

门保护是什么？
门保护是一个类似于箱子锁插件的系统，只不过是保护门的罢了，你还在担心你的门被僵尸打掉吗，你还在担心你的们被某个坏人搬走吗，别担心，门保护来拯救你【别吐槽private可以锁】

权限
doorlock.open




DoorProtection.jar
(3.42 KB, 下载次数: 219)



2013-3-8 22:54 上传
点击文件名下载附件






使用方法：直接拖入插件文件夹即可
